languages.text: {n}Свирепый хрип звучит, как рык.{/n} "Они изранили и пленили меня, заклинили суставы брони. Когда меня волокли на корабль, двое моих братьев обрушились на ксеносов и попытались отбить меня. Безумная затея, но она почти увенчалась успехом... Почти". {n}На потемневшем от горя лице застыла гримаса боли.{/n} "Так нас стало трое пленников. Затем двое. Затем я вновь остался один".

{n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."
languages.original_text: {n}Свирепый хрип звучит, как рык.{/n} "Они изранили и пленили меня, заклинили суставы брони. Когда меня волокли на корабль, двое моих братьев обрушились на ксеносов и попытались отбить меня. Безумная затея, но она почти увенчалась успехом... Почти". {n}На потемневшем от горя лице застыла гримаса боли.{/n} "Так нас стало трое пленников. Затем двое. Затем я вновь остался один".

When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

languages.text: {n}他叹了口气，声音仿佛咆哮一样。{/n}“他们打伤了我，抓住了我。他们冻住了我盔甲上的关节部分。正当他们准备把我拖上船的时候，我的两个战友从天而降，打算把我从异形手中解救出来。那是个疯狂的计划，差点就成功了……只差一点。”{n}乌尔法脸上的肌肉抽搐着，蒙上了一层悲痛的阴影。{/n}“于是，我们一共有三个人遭到了俘虏。后来，只剩下了两个。再后来，我再次变得孤身一人。”
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

traits.locale_text: {n}他叹了口气，声音仿佛咆哮一样。{/n}“他们打伤了我，抓住了我。他们冻住了我盔甲上的关节部分。正当他们准备把我拖上船的时候，我的两个战友从天而降，打算把我从异形手中解救出来。那是个疯狂的计划，差点就成功了……只差一点。”{n}乌尔法脸上的肌肉抽搐着，蒙上了一层悲痛的阴影。{/n}“于是，我们一共有三个人遭到了俘虏。后来，只剩下了两个。再后来，我再次变得孤身一人。”

languages.text: {n}Suspira profundamente con un sonido que parece un gruñido.{/n} «Me hirieron y me capturaron. Congelaron las articulaciones de mi armadura. Cuando me arrastraron a su nave, dos de mis hermanos de batalla se lanzaron contra los xenos para intentar liberarme. Era una locura de plan, pero casi funcionó... Casi». {n}El rostro de Ulfar es una mueca de dolor cubierto de pesar.{/n} «Los tres acabamos prisioneros. Después solo quedamos dos. Y al final acabé solo una vez más».
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suspira profundamente con un sonido que parece un gruñido.{/n} «Me hirieron y me capturaron. Congelaron las articulaciones de mi armadura. Cuando me arrastraron a su nave, dos de mis hermanos de batalla se lanzaron contra los xenos para intentar liberarme. Era una locura de plan, pero casi funcionó... Casi». {n}El rostro de Ulfar es una mueca de dolor cubierto de pesar.{/n} «Los tres acabamos prisioneros. Después solo quedamos dos. Y al final acabé solo una vez más».

languages.text: {n}彼はため息をつくと、うなるように喋った。{/n}「ヤツらは俺を傷つけ、捕らえた。ヤツらは俺の鎧の関節部を凍らせた。俺を船に引きずり込むと、2人の戦闘同胞が異種族の上に飛びかかり、俺を解放しようとした。非常識な計画だったが、もう少しで成功するところだった…あと少しだった」{n}悲痛な表情がウルファーの顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「そして、俺たち3人が捕虜になった。そして2人になった。そして俺は再び1人になったわけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はため息をつくと、うなるように喋った。{/n}「ヤツらは俺を傷つけ、捕らえた。ヤツらは俺の鎧の関節部を凍らせた。俺を船に引きずり込むと、2人の戦闘同胞が異種族の上に飛びかかり、俺を解放しようとした。非常識な計画だったが、もう少しで成功するところだった…あと少しだった」{n}悲痛な表情がウルファーの顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「そして、俺たち3人が捕虜になった。そして2人になった。そして俺は再び1人になったわけだ」

languages.text: {n}Er stößt ein Seufzen aus, das zu einem Knurren verkommt.{/n} "Sie haben mich verwundet und gefangen genommen. Sie haben die Gelenke in meiner Rüstung eingefroren. Als sie mich auf ihr Schiff geschleppt haben, sind zwei meiner Kampfbrüder über die Xenos hergefallen und haben versucht, mich zu befreien. Ein wahnsinniger Plan, doch er hätte fast Erfolg gehabt ... Fast." {n}Eine Maske der Pein liegt auf Ulfars Gesicht, überschattet von Trauer.{/n} "Und so wurden wir drei gefangen genommen. Und dann waren wir nur noch zwei. Und dann war ich wieder allein."
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er stößt ein Seufzen aus, das zu einem Knurren verkommt.{/n} "Sie haben mich verwundet und gefangen genommen. Sie haben die Gelenke in meiner Rüstung eingefroren. Als sie mich auf ihr Schiff geschleppt haben, sind zwei meiner Kampfbrüder über die Xenos hergefallen und haben versucht, mich zu befreien. Ein wahnsinniger Plan, doch er hätte fast Erfolg gehabt ... Fast." {n}Eine Maske der Pein liegt auf Ulfars Gesicht, überschattet von Trauer.{/n} "Und so wurden wir drei gefangen genommen. Und dann waren wir nur noch zwei. Und dann war ich wieder allein."

languages.text: {n}Il pousse un soupir qui ressemble davantage à un grognement.{/n} « J'ai fini par être blessé et capturé. Les misérables ont gelé les joints de mon armure. Quand ils m'ont traîné jusqu'à leur vaisseau, deux de mes frères de bataille ont attaqué les xénos pour tenter de me libérer. Un plan insensé, mais qui a presque fonctionné... Presque. » {n}Une grimace de douleur teintée de chagrin s'installe sur le visage d'Ulfar.{/n} « C'est ainsi qu'ils nous ont capturés tous les trois. Puis nous ne fûmes plus que deux. Et enfin, je me suis retrouvé seul. »
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

Quand ils m'ont traîné jusqu'à leur vaisseau, deux de mes frères de bataille ont attaqué les xénos pour tenter de me libérer. Un plan insensé, mais qui a presque fonctionné... Presque. » {n}Une grimace de douleur teintée de chagrin s'installe sur le visage d'Ulfar.{/n} « C'est ainsi qu'ils nous ont capturés tous les trois. Puis nous ne fûmes plus que deux. Et enfin, je me suis retrouvé seul. »

When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar iç çekerken âdeta uluyor.{/n} "Beni yaralayıp yakaladılar. Zırhımdaki eklemleri dondurdular. Gemilerine sürüklerlerken iki silahdaşım beni kurtarmak için zenolara saldırdı. Çılgınca bir plandı, neredeyse işe yarıyordu... Neredeyse." {n}Ulfar'ın yüzüne kederli bir ifadeyle gölgelenen, acılı bir bakış oturuyor.{/n} "Üçümüzü de tutsak ettiler. Ardından sayımız ikiye düştü. En son da yine bir başıma kaldım."
languages.original_text: {n}He heaves a sigh and it comes out like a growl.{/n} "They wounded me and captured me. They froze the joints in my armour. When they dragged me to their ship, two of my battle-brothers descended up the xenos and tried to free me. An insane plan, but it almost succeeded... Almost." {n}A grimace of pain is fixed on Ulfar's face, which is shadowed with grief.{/n} "And so there were three of us taken captive. And then there were two. And then I was alone once again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar iç çekiyor ama kulağına uluma gibi geliyor.{/n} "Beni yaralayıp yakaladılar. Zırhımdaki eklemleri dondurdular. Beni gemilerine sürüklediklerinde iki silah kardeşim beni kurtarmak için zenolara saldırdı. Çılgınca bir plandı ama neredeyse işe yarıyordu... Neredeyse." {n}Ulfar'ın yüzüne kederli bir ifadeyle gölgelenen, acılı bir bakış oturuyor.{/n} "Üçümüzü de tutsak ettiler. Ardından iki kişi kaldık. Sonra da yeniden tek başımaydım."
